statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null || cd ~; dir_name=$(basename "$cwd"); [ "$cwd" = "$HOME" ] && dir_name="~"; git_info=""; if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); status=""; git diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || status="${status}!"; git diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null || status="${status}+"; [ -n "$(git ls-files --others --exclude-standard 2>/dev/null)" ] && status="${status}?"; if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git_info=" $(printf '\033[90m \033[0m')$(printf '\033[90m%s\033[0m' "$branch")"; [ -n "$status" ] && git_info="${git_info}$(printf '\033[38;5;218m%s\033[0m' " $status")"; fi; fi; printf '\033[34m%s\033[0m%s' "$dir_name" "$git_info"
